title: Mafia 3 Poll
body:
Game runs fine with 60 FPS on my rig. Compressing files now. Don’t know if the final size will change just yet.

OK, I was busy with family stuff yesterday. So, here’s the update.

I will release repack after the patch. And I hope they won’t change much, so I won’t need to rebuild data again. Also I hope that current Voksi and CODEX cracks will still work on it, haha.

Current repack size is 18.3~18.5 GB, depending on selected language. Not very small, but the game has 10 GBs of movies and ~6 GBs of audio. Everything else goes to models, animation and textures. So one can guess, why the game is so blurry and why it can’t be fixed by any patch. They simply made it with year 2000 textures. Most of them do not exceed 512×512 pixels in resolution. Meh.

And yes, just like with Mafia 2, you’ll get my “Exclusive DLC” with pinups, Playboy covers and artworks, taken from game resources 🙂
